name: International Conference on Innovative Technologies in Recent Research
content: Yazhli Global Multidisciplinary Research Organization (YGMRO) is an service based organization registered under Government of India for the development of research activities in the broad field of Science, Engineering, Technology & Management. International Conference on Innovative Technologies in Recent Research (ICITRR) is predominantly organized to help the growing researchers who can exhibit their innovative ideas and thoughts in a universal gathering.
